Package cmput301.team19.lendz

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnBookClickListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBookActivity
    Activity where a book object is created and sent to firestore it also implements a view.Onclicklistener which opens a barcode scanner when the scan Button is pressed
    AddBookTest  
    Book
    Stores data about books and provides methods for synchronization with Firestore.
    BookDescription
    Immutable object that stores information about the ISBN, title, author, and description of a Book.
    BookTest
    Tests the Book class.
    BorrowBookFragment
    This fragment displays the borrowed books of the current user as well as the sent and accepted request for books.
    EditBookTest  
    EditUserProfileFragment
    Fragment for editing user profile information.
    Location
    Stores information about a location by latitude, longitude, and optional address.
    LocationTest
    Tests the Location class.
    LoginActivity
    This is this Class that handles logging in of the user.
    LoginActivityTest
    Test class for LoginActivity.
    MainActivity
    this activity contains the bottom navigation of the app
    MyBooksFragment
    Fragment that displays all the books the current user owns
    NotificationsFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    Request
    Stores information about a request for a book.
    RequestTest
    Tests the Request class.
    ScanActivity  
    SearchBooksActivity
    Activity that allows the user to search for books based on keywords
    SearchBooksActivityTest  
    SearchViewAdapter
    RecyclerAdapter for presenting the searchResults
    SignUpActivity
    This is the class that handles signing up a new user It grabs data input by the user and signs them up using firebase inbuilt authentication then stores their data in Firestore.
    SignUpActivityTest
    Test class for SignUp Activity.
    User
    Stores information about a user and provides methods for synchronizing with Firestore.
    UserProfileTest  
    UserTest
    Tests the User class.
    ViewBookFragment
    Fragment for viewing book details information Used in BookActivity
    ViewBooksAdapter  
    ViewBooksAdapter.ViewHolder  
    ViewBooksSection  
    ViewBooksSectionAdapter  
    ViewUserProfileFragment
    Fragment for viewing user profile information.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BookStatus  
    RequestStatus
